Return the card to your hand.
The card Retains this turn.

keywords.name: Hunted
keywords.description: Takes 10% more damage for each stack of Hunted on them. When applied, all other hunted enemies are no longer hunted, and other enemies take 10% less damage for each stack. Reduces by 1 each turn.

keywords.description: Ignited creatures lose 1 HP per stack at the start of their turn.

keywords.description: At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, shuffle it into your draw pile and put an infestation counter on it.

keywords.name: Inscribed

keywords.name: Inspiration

keywords.name: Invincible
keywords.description:

keywords.description: At the end of your turn, cards in your hand with Fire Counters make you take damage equal to their Fire Counter. They then increase the Fire Counter. Cards with Fire Counters play an additional copy of themselves for every Fire Counter above 1, and Exhaust.
